issue.title: Gazebo crashes if a plugin parameter has an empty value

content.raw: I created a patch for sdf::Element, that introduces a null check of the value pointer before accessing it in the GetValueX() methods and returns the default value if no value is available. For strings this behavior is natural. For the other datatypes, it might be worth to print a warning. See https://bitbucket.org/johmeyer/gazebo/commits/ffddf9ef65474792581e7b892c15763a9a78554d.
content.html: I created a patch for sdf::Element, that introduces a null check of the value pointer before accessing it in the GetValueX() methods and returns the default value if no value is available. For strings this behavior is natural. For the other datatypes, it might be worth to print a warning. See https://bitbucket.org/johmeyer/gazebo/commits/ffddf9ef65474792581e7b892c15763a9a78554d.
